Count points over polygons

May 4, 2016

After creating choropleth from the population, now I wanted to color the polygons (now distrits) according to the number of the spatial points over them.

First I generated some (500) random points over Budapest with some random values (but this was not used at this time).

The I had to convert this data.frame into a SpatialPointsDataFrame obejct.

For the counting I used the poly.counts function of the GISTools package. And added counts to the data slot of the read dataset with the name counts and made the choropleth.
